thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Jen

author: Jen
title: Jen
text: I cannot fault Intrepid in terms of a seamless experience, great customer service and fabulous itineraries. If you want a holiday where you have a lot of interesting and diverse experiences, see many different places in a short time but still do more than scratch the surface, get to travel with fun people and don't have to spend a fortune, this is the right company for you.
